content: @John Moehrke there are references - which I've now removed - to a break-the-glass example in the security labels page - what should happen here?

ah, the example audit event was added in R5, but this page was brought over to R4B. Previously we simply had

Any use is well-represented in an AuditEvent (todo: profile for break the glass)

so, I guess we go back to that?
